articles.author: Eric W. Dolan
articles.title: Fluoride exposure during pregnancy linked to child neurobehavioral issues - PsyPost
articles.description: A study found that higher prenatal fluoride exposure is linked to nearly double the risk of neurobehavioral problems in children at age three, highlighting potential risks even at levels considered safe for preventing dental cavities.
articles.content: Fluoride has been added to community drinking water systems in the United States since 1945 to prevent dental cavities. Currently, 73% of the U.S. population receives fluoridated water at a targeted … [+7074 chars]

articles.author: Eric W. Dolan
articles.title: Scientists reveal startling impact of junk food on the brain’s reward center - PsyPost
articles.description: Junk-food consumption followed by deprivation increases food-seeking behavior and CP-AMPAR transmission in the nucleus accumbens of obesity-prone rats, highlighting significant neural and behavioral changes.
articles.content: A recent study published in the journal Neuropharmacologysheds light on how consuming high-calorie, sugary, and fatty junk-food diets affects brain function and behavior. Researchers found that these… [+6038 chars]

articles.title: Woman diagnosed with cancer after spotting symptom that only came out when she drank alcohol - LADbible
articles.description: Dance student Lucy Wiswould-Green, from Lincoln, told how she was diagnosed with Hodgkin lymphoma after noticing a strange symptom when she drank alcohol.

articles.author: Piyali Bhadra
articles.title: Vegetables that increase uric acid levels in the body - The Times of India
articles.description: Let's take a look at all the vegetables which increase uric acid levels.
articles.content: A green, healthy, and beneficial food for individuals surviving with gout because of its low purine content, it means that it contributes to uric acid production and triggers gout flare-ups.
